text.description:
{Wasp Wings}

This item increases your units' speed by +1 and grants access to the Air Magic spell - Jump.
text.event: You pick up the Wasp Wings, their delicate, translucent form radiating an otherworldly energy. A sudden rush of agility flows through you, and the power to leap great distances now resides at your fingertips.
text.name: Wasp Wings
